Forward

Back

To use this website click on "forward" when you would like to move to the next slideshow. Click "back" to return to the last slide. This project was created using the coding languages HTML, CSS, and JavaScript to create a functional story slideshow. The collaborators and creators of this project include Benjamin Pecanha, 705, Ayaka Sekiguchi, 705, and Sohani Shinde. Our group was promised extra credit in exchange for us to create this project in code. The rest of the class seems to have created their projects in CS first, Scratch. Try opening this website on your phone! You'll see that even then the website is designed to adapt. This website will be removed from the internet after the STEM project is graded.
